definition: to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]

sentences.english: I escorted my guest to my offfice.
sentences.chinese: 我陪同我的客人去了我的办公室。

sentences.english: On April 1, Thornburgh accompanied President Jimmy Carter on a tour of Three Mile Island.
sentences.chinese: 4月1日，索恩伯勒陪同总统吉米卡特视察了三里岛。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等中方陪同人员参加会见。

sentences.english: President Bush, who escorted Mrs. Ford into the Cathedral, delivered the main eulogy.
sentences.chinese: 布什总统陪同福特夫人同往教堂并致悼词。
有人陪同生活才会更美妙。

sentences.english: I was in Beijing, accompanying my niece to school interviews.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京，陪同我侄女去参加学校面试。

sentences.english: The professor the lecture hall by several assistant teachers.
sentences.chinese: 教授在几位助教的陪同下走进了报告厅。

sentences.english: I play judge, jury, convict and victim.
sentences.chinese: 我扮演着法官，陪同审判团，罪犯和遭到杀害者。

sentences.english: He had accompanied a convoy of emergency food supplies to the starving people of Pader.
sentences.chinese: 当时他陪同运粮车队到帕德救济挨饿的百姓。

sentences.english: Washing dishes just doesn't sound as good as chaperoning passengers on exotic excursions.
sentences.chinese: 洗碗就不如陪同船上的旅客听起来体面。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other members of the entourage arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等陪同人员同机抵达。

sentences.english: Show the guest the way to the elevator and introduce some of the hotel facilities.
sentences.chinese: 陪同客人至电梯，并向客人介绍酒店设施。

sentences.english: After the lunch, I accompanied Pam to her first television interview.
sentences.chinese: 午餐之后，我陪同帕梅拉去参加她的第一次电视专访。

sentences.english: Do you think she's the proper lady-in-waiting for a queen?
sentences.chinese: 你认为她是陪同王后的合适人选吗？

sentences.english: Chairman Wu's other companions arrived in the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 吴邦国委员长的其他陪同人员同机抵达。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other accompanying personnel arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等陪同人员同机抵达。

definition: to lend an arm to support sb
to visit/to pay a call to
to visit/to call on sb/to look around
to meet with (sb who is paying a visit)/CL:次[ci4]
to pay a visit/to call on
to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
to visit (a patient, prisoner etc)/to look inquiringly
